name: Close Me
description: You start the game, you wake up, and eventually you will close the game. One day, you may even start the game again. That's the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
